segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that plate, not looking anywhere else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing with water pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot in it already, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, there are stacks of clean dishes on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, I can see a neat garden outside, so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how calm it looks out there compared to in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip on that wet floor soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real mess if she doesn't turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, looking all domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR
